channel.title: Acoole's Auto Talker

item.title: Acoole's Auto Talker
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

need a shift keys function for that ‘:’ hotkey.
and until(false)?
use a var!
heres the updated one:

{ACOOLE'S Auto Talker 1.0 Beta.}

//Author: Acoole
//Thanks: Everyone, i studied your scripts to help me.
//Name Acoole's auto talker 1 Beta
//Description:
//This is a basic Auto talker no form, yet...., I Will update it very frequently
//It DOES NOT Use SRL.
//Sorry, i dont no SRL Very well yet...

program AutoTalker;

var
howmanytimes : integer;

const
//SAY WHAT YOU WANT TO SAY\\
Mesage= '';//Type what you want to say here. Remember to include text effects e.g wave: white: green: etc...
howmanytimestosay=10;//how many times to say it


// Procedure Shift and then the byte to press Shift and another key.
// by Ron. Example... Shift(186); would send a colon.
Procedure Shift(b : byte);
Begin
  Wait(20+Random(30));
  KeyDown(16)
  Wait(20+Random(30));
  KeyDown(b);
  Wait(20+Random(30));
  KeyUp(b)
  Wait(20+Random(30));
  KeyUp(16);
  Wait(20+Random(30));
End;


Procedure Actalk;
begin
SendKeysSilent(Mesage+chr(13))
howmanytimes:=howmanytimestosay+1
  wait(2000+Random(3000))
end;

Begin
  Repeat
    Actalk;
  Until(howmanytimestosay=howmanytimestosay)
end.

If it doesnt work pm me.
Credits go to ron for that shift key procedure.

Read full topic

item.title: Acoole's Auto Talker
item.dc:creator: @acoole acoole
item.description:
@acoole wrote:

Hi,

I’m so happy my first script is here:

[code]ACOOLE’S Auto Talker 1.0 Beta.

//Author: Acoole
//Thanks: Everyone, i studied your scripts to help me.
//Name Acoole’s auto talker 1 Beta
//Description:
// This is a basic Auto talker no form, yet…, I Will update it very frequently
//It DOES NOT Use SRL.
//Sorry, i dont no SRL Very well yet…

program AutoTalker;
const
//TEXT SETUP-SAY WHAT YOU WANT TO SAY//
Mesage= ‘’;//Type what you want to say here. Remember to include text effects e.g wave: white: green: etc…
//END SETUP//
Procedure Actalk;
begin
SendKeysSilent(Mesage+chr(13))
wait(2000+Random(3000))
end;
Begin
Repeat
Actalk;
Until(false)
end.[/code]

Instructions pretty much inside the script. TESTED FULLY AND WORKS FINE!

Thanks,
-Acoole

PS I dont know the [SCAR] Code so i had to put it in code please mods fix it.

Read full topic
